name: Crossfire (itch) (HackTrout)
description:
- How to Play -

 

Use the WASD keys to move. You can also use the Arrow keys. Left Click to throw items towards the cursor. Press Space when enemies have an item above their head.  This will let you craft the enemies into the item above their head!  Crafting multiple enemies at once will net you more items per enemy! - Tips & Tricks - -> Different items can be used to craft different resources, so experiment to find new items! -> Zombies are generally used to create new stones while skeletons are used to create new tools! -> Rarer tools can harvest new materials from rocks, magma and fungi! -> Fungi is often used to create medicines! Music from https://www.zapsplat.com
